title: [1.7.10][SSP/SMP][不再更新]Mo' 剑 ——超级diao的剑∑
author: 岩井西衣
txt_content:
本帖最后由 岩井西衣 于 2015-5-17 13:39 编辑 

作者的一些话：
Hey everybody! I'm extremely happy to finally release my very first original mod (that I coded and textured myself), the Mo' Swords Mod! This is the final version, and I probably won't be updating it anymore. And in case anybody was wondering, Syntthetix would be me.



一些图片：












不要做伸手党，点击下面的评分给我一个人气（不用扣你自己的
